title: Coding a product

\pard\pardeftab720\partightenfactor0 \cf2 \expnd0\expndtw0\kerning0 import { Link as GatsbyLink } from “gatsby”\cf0 \kerning1\expnd0\expndtw0

For roughly the past 5 years I have been working as what I think is safe to call a software developer. This role, to my mind, fully entails the act of writing, maintaining and, if you are lucky, deleting code. As I have mentioned in <GatsbyLink to=’93/’94>a previous post }

frontmatter.title: The most important thing a programmer does
